Package lu.uni.geko.weaver.scope

The scope package of the weaver plug-in for GeKo, a generic model weaver.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
AdviceInstantiationScope A representation of the scope for which an advice element should be instantiated independent of other instantiations of the same advice element.
 

Class Summary
AdviceAndScopeResolver Utility class for resolving the advice elements that represent base elements together with their advice instantiation scopes from advice models.
CustomScope Implementation of the custom advice instantiation scope type resulting in an instance for every match of a set of advice elements.
ScopeFactory A utility factory for creating advice instantiation scope implementations based on their type.
 

Enum Summary
ScopeType The type of advice instantiation scope specifying how it can be determined whether an advice element has to be re-instantiated.
 

Package lu.uni.geko.weaver.scope Description

The scope package of the weaver plug-in for GeKo, a generic model weaver. Responsible for the representation of the scope for which an advice element should be instantiated independent of other instantiations of the same advice element.
